amendment.description: To increase criminal penalties for fraud and false statements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 624 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 624 proposed by Senator Baucus to Amendment SA 555. (consideration: CR S6409; text: CR S6409) To increase criminal penalties for fraud and false statements.
